title: Print, "Design for Three Wall Brackets with Vases", 1745
title_raw: Design for Three Wall Brackets with Vases
medium: Etching and engraving on off-white laid paper
inscribed: On plate, upper left: 18me. Livre.; upper center: C.P.S.C.M.; upper right: S.; upper center, in the image: Livre D'Ornemens a divers usages, Nouvellement/jnventé par françois de Cuvilliés, premier/Architecte de S.A.S.E. de Baviere./Gravé par Cuvilli[és] le fils.; lower center, in the image: Se vend a Paris chez le Sr. Poilly ruë St. Iacques, a/l'jmage St. Benoit, Avec Privilege du Roy,/ét chez l'auteur.; lower right: 1
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux (D. 80 and 81)
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council

tombstone.epitaph: Print, "Design for Three Wall Brackets with Vases", 1745. Etching and engraving on off-white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-285-94.
